strategy_reasoning: Since these updates are mostly 'chores' and 'fixes' (billing codes, legal docs, migrations), the 'Cozy Garden Maintenance' metaphor works perfectly. It translates dry technical debt into a wholesome narrative of tidying up our digital space, fitting the 'Unpacking' or 'Stardew Valley' aesthetic. It makes maintenance feel satisfying rather than boring.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a cute 8-bit bee character holding a pixelated wrench and a flower in a sunny digital garden. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel blue gradient background. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Text in pixel font: 'GARDEN UPDATE'. Like Stardew Valley meets coding. Emotionally warm, nostalgic but beautiful.
images.description: Cover image introducing the 'maintenance' theme with our mascot.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit pixel art inventory screen UI showing sorted items. One slot has a gold coin icon labeled '402', another has a silver key icon labeled '403'. Soft pastel background. Clean pixel UI, cozy vibes like Unpacking game. Warm, inviting. Text in pixel font: 'SORTED & FIXED'. Lime green accents.
images.description: Visualizing the 402/403 error code consolidation as organizing an RPG inventory.

images.prompt: Pixel art library scene with soft window light. A tiny 8-bit character is straightening books on a shelf (Legal Docs) and gently removing a clutter item. Soft pastel colors, lime green (#ecf874) highlights. Peaceful atmosphere, clean lines. Text in pixel font: 'POLISHED'.
images.description: Representing the legal page styling and removal of donation links as tidying up a room.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art workshop scene. A tiny mechanic bee is tuning up a small cute robot labeled 'Klein' and moving a shipping crate labeled 'Flux'. Warm lamp lighting, soft shadows. Chunky retro sprites. Nostalgic gaming vibes. Text in pixel font: 'UNDER THE HOOD'.
images.description: Illustrating the technical fixes for Klein model tracking and Flux docker migration.

caption:
Spring cleaning came early to the code garden! üßπ‚ú® We've been busy tidying up the backend to make everything bloom brighter. 

Here's what we unpacked:
ü™ô Sorted our inventory: Billing errors are now 402, Permissions are 403. Neat & tidy!
üìú Polished the scrolls: Legal pages got a glow-up and we simplified our funding links.
üîß Under the hood: Fixed tracking for the Klein model & migrated Flux to its new home.

Just keeping things cozy and functional for you all. Keep creating! üå∏üêù

alt_text: A carousel of cozy 8-bit pixel art images. 1. A pixel bee gardener. 2. A retro game inventory screen sorting coins and keys. 3. A pixel character tidying a library. 4. A mechanic bee fixing a robot. All in soft pastels and lime green.
